NYC based graphic designer / ex-tax accountant who loves Disney, dogs (especially big ones), roller coasters, deadlifts and pastel yellow.

If you'd like to see more work, collaborate, or just say hello, lets stay in touch! message me at helen.shiu@outlook.com
